entry.title: WIND WARNING , White Rock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: White Rock 6:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: 7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 5.4°C
Wind: NNE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 except southeast 60 gusting to 80 near the water overnight. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except southeast 60 gusting to 80 near the water early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 early in the afternoon then light late in the afternoon. High 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early in the evening. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near the water. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
